import api from'./api';// Auth related API calls
const authService={// Login user
login:(email,password)=>{return api.post('/auth/login',{email,password});},// Get current user data
getCurrentUser:()=>{return api.get('/auth/me');},// Change password
changePassword:(currentPassword,newPassword)=>{return api.post('/auth/change-password',{currentPassword,newPassword});}};export default authService;
